CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: To assess the charge transport properties for the PBDT-TDPP-S:PC71BM blend used as photoactive layer , we measured the J-V characteristics of single charge carrier devices at room temperature and applied space-charge-limited-current ( SCLC ) model to extract the charge carrier mobility.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| PC71BM |

Explanation:

* PBDT-TDPP-S: This is a material name as it is mentioned in the context of being used as a photoactive layer in the PBDT-TDPP-S:PC71BM blend.
* PC71BM: This is also a material name as it is part of the blend (PBDT-TDPP-S:PC71BM) used as a photoactive layer.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| PC71BM |

Explanation:

* PBDT-TDPP-S: This is the only clear material name mentioned in the context of being used as a photoactive layer in the PBDT-TDPP-S:PC71BM blend.
* PC71BM: This is also a material name as it is part of the blend (PBDT-TDPP-S:PC71BM) used as a photoactive layer.

The other terms in the paragraph are not material names:

* "charge transport properties" is a property, not a material.
* "J-V characteristics" is a property, not a material.
* "single charge carrier devices" is a device, not a material.
* "room temperature" is a condition, not a material.
* "applied space-charge-limited-current (SCLC) model" is a model, not a material.
* "charge carrier mobility" is a property, not a material.
